text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1021.103

name: BirthSex
title: Birth Sex
description: Codes for assigning sex at birth as specified by the [Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)](https://www.healthit.gov/newsroom/about-onc)
